title: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it cont.....
body:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc00012f.

This is happening every time I try to launch my LoLclient. It's updated and i've tried repairing and nothing works :(

Please help!

replies.body: I am having the same issue! i dont know how to fix it
i had luck deleting the riot games folder off of my C: drive and then reinstalling the game completely. Make sure you manually delete the folder off of the drive or it isn't going to work though.
Thanks so much - nothing else was working!
i keep having the issue and i'm uninstalling for the 4th time, does anyone else have to keep uninstalling/reinstalling to get league to work?
Delete Riot Games folder from C: drive and then uninstall/reinstall. It worked for me it seems.
hey! can you tell me how to delete the riot games folder off my C: drive? Answer ASAP TYYY

enter c program files or wherever you installed the game.Look for a folder called Riot Games.Delete it . Then run the setup and remove the game,after that reinstall the game,either you should download the setup again or run the setup again and it should work

If you are unable to do this and have it fix it, then I recommend asking a friend for a copy of their file. Mine works just fine on my laptop so I simply copied it from my laptop to my desktop after what would have worked for others failed for me.
If you do not have friends that will comply (Or need to get on league in order for them to talk to you) then you may use this external link instead.
Please note that with this being a public link, I cannot guarantee any safety checks on the file itself and I highly recommend you scan this file first just to be safe as I do not want anybody getting any sort of virus while trying to fix this client.

[libcurl.dll backup](https://www.dropbox.com/s/b0fn3tmapxdj2vc/libcurl.dll?dl=0)

Good luck summoners and I hope you have a great game! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Hey. I'm kinda a noob to all this stuff. How do i copy my file from desktop to my laptop exactly?
Thanks it worked for me, just replaced the one in my folder and it did the trick
tnx this is really helpgul
Thanks a lot man, this worked immediately! {{champion:103}}
THANK YOU SO MUCH! I have tried so meany different things to get rid of this. and finally this saved me!!!!

That kind of error makes it sounds like your pc is trying to access a certain file that it doesn't have permissions to read from. You should be able to get around that by going over [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).

Hit me back up if that doesn't get you back in the game!
this one worked for me but I have no clue what it did to fix it
I followed all the steps and am still unable to get into game :C

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Zk8AsREU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-28T01:16:47.868+0000)
>
> That kind of error makes it sounds like your pc is trying to access a certain file that it doesn't have permissions to read from. You should be able to get around that by going over [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).
> 
> Hit me back up if that doesn't get you back in the game!

This has happened to me several times.  When it happened the second time, I just copy/pasted the contents of the previous download ..."League of Legends" folder into the one that wasn't working and it worked fine.

this file its not here
 where i can find the file???

I just want to put this out there if it might help anyone!

There are a couple files such as libcurl or the BugSplat ones that have the description of Crash Report or something and when I permanently deleted those it started working and I found this by looking at those files descriptions in the recycling bin when I deleted them them for the first time.

Hope it help :)

Thanks man! saved me from re installing the game yet again. And League of legends uses so much data to reinstall.
Thanks again!
Getting real fed up of having to delete from pc and reinstall every day just to play...
i need help pls :( plssss my lol dosent working the program are saing run on windous or contains a error
